aboutMe.bio: Versatile Staff Software Engineer combining technical excellence with product leadership experience. Currently driving innovation with Angular 19+ and NestJS at Cefalo Bangladesh Limited. Former Product Owner at StiboDX Limited, where I successfully bridged the gap between business requirements and technical implementation while leading development teams. 12+ years of hands-on experience in full-stack development, system architecture, and agile product management. M.Sc. in Computer Science & Engineering.
